objects.description: [STATICPLUGIN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1238) has been signed with a valid Certificate Authority(CA) to circumvent endpoint defenses.(Citation: Google Threat Intelligence Group MUSTANG PANDA PLUGX August 2025)
